title: Citigroup CFO John Gerspach to Present June 13 at the 2017 Morgan Stanley Financials Conference
summary: New York - John Gerspach, Chief Financial Officer of Citigroup, will present at the 2017 Morgan Stanley Financials Conference on Tuesday, June 13, 2017. A live webcast will be available at approximately 11:10 a.m. (Eastern) at https://www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.
tag-1: Citigroup CFO John Gerspach to Present June 13 at the 2017 Morgan Stanley Financials Conference
tag-2: New York – John Gerspach, Chief Financial Officer of Citigroup, will present at the 2017 Morgan Stanley Financials Conference on Tuesday, June 13, 2017. A live webcast will be available at approximately 11:10 a.m. (Eastern) at https://www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.
tag-3: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-4: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://blog.citigroup.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi.
